name: Darker Docs
description: This is a very simple darkening of Google Docs.  It only darkens the main background of the toolbar area, main editor body, and the margins around the editing area.
additional_info:
This primarily affects, and is designed for, Documents, but it styles the other Google Docs a bit too.  More work would need to be done to expand the theme to other Docs similarly.  This theme is intended to be able to be used without affecting overall usage of Docs as-is, but with a lower key interface for less eye strain.

Changelog:

10/16/2012
 - Changed color of scrollbar, in Chrome.  It was too dark to see
 - Added moz-document to restrict URLs
